document.full_text: the country hopes to collect millions of dollars in flyover fees if it regains authority over traffic in its airspace, which the united nations has controlled since 1996.
document.title: somalia, wobbly on ground, seeks control of its airspace
lines_and_colors: the country hopes to collect millions of dollars in flyover fees if it regains authority over traffic in its airspace, which the united nations has controlled since 1996.
